overview: A single human figure waves back and forth in a pattern that reproduces the composerâ€™s movements making the shaker sound on which the piece is based.  The movement was initially videoed with a phone, the sound recorded on a good deck.  The video was then analyzed carefully frame by frame, and converted to a movement score that was then performed by a dancer and a homemade camera.  In this process it becomes something other, refracted through multiple layers of interpretation, its calm insistence full of a sense of meaning that finally passes without ever having revealed more than the enigmatic gesture itself.  Shot with a homemade pinhole camera onto homemade emulsion.
title: Signals
